content:
As we discussed, I do not want to worry about resume and the MVP promised in the post at all right now, let's just focus on this:
Step 1: AI Memory & Influence Mapping (Today)
🔹 Goal: Make AI think like you & your mentors
✅ Structured AI Memory Storage – AI retains your entire background, skills, decisions, and conversations so we never lose context again.
✅ Deep Research AI – AI absorbs insights from your chosen mentors (Alon, Keith, Naval, Altman, Ferriss, etc.) and integrates their thinking styles.
✅ Custom AI Training – AI begins advising you like an elite hybrid of these influences rather than just generic AI responses.
✅ Life Optimization Layer – AI starts tracking your key areas (business, training, Chewy, job automation) and gives targeted next steps in real-time.

🔹 Outcome: AI knows you inside out and guides you with precision. No wasted time reprocessing old chats.
